entry.entryTitle: What are the main features of XML compared to HTML?

unorderedList.item: XML is the acronym from Extensible Markup Language (meta-language of noting/marking). XML is a resembling language with HTML. It was developed for describing data.
The XML tags are not pre-defined in XML. You will have to create tags according to your needs. XML is self descriptive.
XML can store data separately from HTML.
XML can be used as a format for exchanging information.
